title: FS: T206 Old Mill Chick Gandil SGC 10/1
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Old Mill Chick Gandil SGC 10/1
posts.post_content:
For Sale is a very tough Old Mill Chick Gandil. Quite possibly his toughest back to find, this is a great opportunity to add one of the "Exclusive 12" to the collection. 

$650 Delivered

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=259650&d=1485827393[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=259651&d=1485827402[/IMG]
Bump. One of the tougher Old Mills as explained on the front page!
